segments.text: I would like to open a checking account at this branch .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have any other accounts with this bank ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I do , at a different location , I have a savings account and a CD .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In that case , we will need to fill out this paperwork . Do you have identification with you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here is my driver's license . Will that work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Do you know what type of checking account you would like to open , business or personal ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Business please . And I want the most simple one you have .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then you would like the ' no frills ' business account .
segments.speaker: S2
